== Kadappuram (627785) ==

Kadappuram is a village in the [[Chavakkad]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 896 hectares and harbouring 4624 households with total population of 22938 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Chavakkad]] is at a distance of 8 km. Male population is 10522 and female population is 12416. Scheduled Caste Population is 613 and Scheduled Tribes population is 16. Census Location Code of the village is 627785<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
